chargeHist.descr: Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor, or Law Enforcement Officer

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
8:35 AM Defendant Samson Denali Bronkhorst in court, in custody.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Samson Denali Bronkhorst.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls cases 22CF190 and 22CF94.
22CF190 - Prelim:
Court reviews form with Deft.
PrelimQues/WOR.
Deft waives prelim.
Atty Schraven is satisfied.
Court finds deft freely waives prelim and binds over for arraignment.
8:37 AM Arraignment:
DA provides a paper copy of the information to the Court and Atty Schraven.
Will e-file later today.
Atty Schraven - waives a formal reading and enters not guilty pleas.
Requests to go directly to a plea hearing.
8:39 Plea Hearing:
DA provides a statement of read-ins to the Court.
DA heard - will be global resolution with both cases.
Atty Schraven provides plea form.
DA heard on agreement.
Atty Schraven agrees.
All parties discuss what the max term of probation can be.
Victim rights compliance.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 1 of 22CF94.
Deft enters a plea of no contest.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 4 of 22CF94.
Deft enters a plea of no contest.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 2 of 22CF190.
Deft enters a plea of no contest.
Non-citizen advisory.
No firearms.
May not vote or serve on jury until civil rights are restored.
PleaQuest/WOR.
Constitutional rights.
Elements of offense.
Read-ins.
Deft understands.
Atty Schraven satisfied.
Factual basis.
Court finds Deft enters plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; therefore court accepts plea and finds Deft guilty to Counts 1 and 4 of 22CF94, and Count 2 of 22CF190.
Court dismisses and reads-in counts 2, 3, and 5 of 22CF94.
Court dismisses and reads-in count 1 of 22CF190.
Court takes note of the statement of read-in, provided by the State, and all the other referrals as referenced on the record by the State.
Court orders presentence investigation be completed.  Agent to provide report to court at least 2 weeks prior to sentencing.
9:11 AM off record.
9:11 AM back on record.
Court schedules with parties.
Court orders Deft to cooperate with the PSI process.
Deft heard.
Atty Schraven heard.
9:15 AM
Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

1:50 PM Defendant Samson Denali Bronkhorst appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Samson Denali Bronkhorst. 
Court calls cases 22CF94 and 22CF190.
Atty Schraven heard - working on a global resolution.
Atty Schraven heard on 22CF190 - Has reviewed complaint with Deft.
Deft understands.
Waives formal reading.
Requests prelim and waives time limits.
DA and Atty Schraven discuss competency.
Atty Schraven heard - status hasn't changed since the last evaluation.
Court schedules with parties.
Prelim & Arraignment to be heard in Branch 2.
1:55 off record.
1:56 back on record.
1:56 PM
Status conference scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

3:30 PM 
Defendant Samson Denali Bronkhorst in court.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Samson Denali Bronkhorst. 
Prelim quest/WOR provided
Def waives prelim
Court finds def freely waives prelim
Def bound over for trial 
Deft Schraven prepared to move to ARGN
DA has no objection and will file complaint / complaint will track
Copy of info
Waives reading
Pleads n/g
Requests STC 
3:36PM
Status conference scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 01:50 pm.
Order for Defendant to abstain from alcohol and for testing

8:29 AM Defendant Samson Denali Bronkhorst (in custody) in court.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Samson Denali Bronkhorst. Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court is heard, Competency hearing & motion for bail 
Atty Schraven has discussed Dr report; not contesting
DA agrees report to be received by Court
Court finds Def is competent to proceed
Atty Schraven is heard re: bond modification
DA is heard on bond
Court modifies bond to $1000.00 cash bond w/conditions: no alch or contr subst w/o valid prescription, no contact w/Walmart store, Soberlink, reside at home (absolutely no going to MI), cooperate w/curr treatment and any services advised by Atty Schraven, no entering any retail establishment unless accompanied by parents, sign WOE
Def understands conditions
Parents understand conditions
8:40 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

8:55 AM Defendant Samson Denali Bronkhorst appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Samson Denali Bronkhorst. 
Court calls case.
Atty Schraven heard - requests matter be heard for competency and bail.
Requests matters be set to a different date.
Court reschedules with parties.
8:57 AM
Competency hearing scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

08:56 AM Defendant Samson Denali Bronkhorst in court with attorney Bradley J. Schraven.  Defendant Samson Denali Bronkhorst in custody.  Kathryn E Heineck appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Samson Denali Bronkhorst appeared by video means.
Court calls case.
Atty Schraven heard.
ADA heard.
Court heard and finds probable cause to believe that a felony was committed and that the deft's competency needs to be evaluated.
Court orders a competency evaluation be completed.

records.addlTxt:
01:52 PM Defendant Samson Denali Bronkhorst in court with attorney Bradley J. Schraven.  Defendant Samson Denali Bronkhorst in custody.  Kathryn E Heineck appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Samson Denali Bronkhorst appeared by video means with Attorney.
Court calls case.
Atty Schraven is present from PD's office for bond purposes only.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Court inquires on Atty.
Atty Schraven heard on competency.
ADA agrees.
Court orders a competency evaluation be completed.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Schraven heard on bond.
Court imposes $5,000 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx, no contact with Walmart. 
Deft to contact the Public Defender's Office today.
1:55 PM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Competency hearing scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
